Class Day

java.lang.Object
  Day

public class Day
extends java.lang.Object

Maintain the appointments for one day in a diary.

Version:
2008.03.30
Author:
David J. Barnes and Michael Kolling

Constructor Detail

Day

public Day(int dayNumber)
Constructor for objects of class Day.

Parameters:

Method Detail

findSpace

public int findSpace(Appointment appointment)
Try to find space for an appointment.

Parameters:
appointment - The appointment to be accommodated.
Returns:
The earliest time today that can accommodate the appointment. Return -1 if there is insufficient space.

getAppointment

public Appointment getAppointment(int time)
Parameters:
time - Which time of day. This must be between the START_OF_DAY time and the FINAL_APPOINTMENT_TIME.
Returns:
The Appointment at the given time. null is returned if either the time is invalid or there is no Appointment at the given time.

getAppointments

public java.lang.String getAppointments()

getDayNumber

public int getDayNumber()
Returns:
The number of this day within the year (1 - 366).

makeAppointment

public boolean makeAppointment(int time,
                               Appointment appointment)
Make an appointment.

Parameters:
time - The hour at which the appointment starts.
appointment - The appointment to be made.
Returns:
true if the appointment was successful, false otherwise.

showAppointments

public void showAppointments()
Print a list of the day's appointments on standard output.

validTime

public boolean validTime(int time)
Returns:
true if the time is between FINAL_APPOINTMENT_TIME and END_OF_DAY, false otherwise.
